title.narrative: Development of Accelerated Learning Materials for Public Sector Accountants and Auditors under the African Professionalization Initiative

description.narrative: A project to support the professionalization of public sector financial management staff across Africa through the delivery of generic public-sector focused learning content and an online hosting platform.

To deliver generic learning content covering the essentials of public sector financial management,to be offered to PAOs and governments across the continent to enable them to enhance the skills and knowledge of individuals working in the public sector. Development of an online learning platform to host the content. Establishment of An Academic Advisory Committee
